Package com.revs.grill

Class Ingredient

java.lang.Object
com.revs.grill.Ingredient
public class Ingredient extends Object
Represents an ingredient used in a recipe or dish.

    • Ingredient

      public Ingredient()
      Default constructor for Ingredient class. Initializes all fields to default values.

    • Ingredient

      public Ingredient(String name, int quantity, int minQuantity, double unitPrice, String supplier)
      Parameterized constructor for Ingredient class. Initializes the fields with the provided values.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the ingredient
      quantity - the quantity of the ingredient
      minQuantity - the minimum quantity required for the ingredient
      unitPrice - the unit price of the ingredient
      supplier - the supplier of the ingredient

  • Method Details

    • lowStock

      public boolean lowStock()
      Checks if the ingredient is low in stock.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient is low in stock, false otherwise

    • findOneById

      public static Ingredient findOneById(int id)
      Finds an ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the ingredient to find
      Returns:
      the ingredient with the specified ID, or null if not found

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the list of ingredients with the specified IDs

    • findByName

      public static List<Ingredient> findByName(String searchName)
      Finds ingredients by their name.
      Parameters:
      searchName - the name to search for
      Returns:
      the list of ingredients with the specified name

    • removeById

      public static boolean removeById(int ingredientId)
      Removes an ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient to remove
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • write

      public void write()
      Writes the ingredient to the database. Sets the ID of the ingredient after writing.

    • updateById

      public static boolean updateById(int itemId, String nameStr, String quantityStr, String minQuantityStr, String unitPriceStr, String supplierStr)
      Updates an ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the ingredient to update
      nameStr - the new name of the ingredient (optional)
      quantityStr - the new quantity of the ingredient (optional)
      minQuantityStr - the new minimum quantity of the ingredient (optional)
      unitPriceStr - the new unit price of the ingredient (optional)
      supplierStr - the new supplier of the ingredient (optional)
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • update

      public boolean update()
      Updates the ingredient in the database.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully updated, false otherwise
